content: भिन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [भिद्-क्त] {@--1@} Broken, torn, split, rent. {@--2@} Divided, separated. {@--3@} Detached, disunited, disjoined. {@--4@} Expanded, blown, opened. {@--5@} Different from, other than (with <ab>abl.</ab>); तस्मादयं भिन्नः. {@--6@} Different, varied. {@--7@} Loosened. {@--8@} Mingled, mixed, blended. {@--9@} Deviating from. {@--10@} Changed. {@--11@} Furious, in rut. {@--12@} Without, deprived of. (See भिद्). --न्नः A defect or flaw in a gem. --न्नं {@--1@} A bit, fragment, part. {@--2@} A blossom. {@--3@} A wound, stab. {@--4@} A fraction.
